import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./ItemQuestion.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import moment from "moment"; function ItemQuestion({ question:{ id, title, category_question, slug, tag, views_couter, votes_couter, comments_couter, username, created_at, } }) { return ( <>
{votes_couter}

votes

{comments_couter}

answers

{views_couter}

views

{title}

{tag}

{category_question} {username} asked {moment(created_at).fromNow(true)} ago
); } export default ItemQuestion;
